english.segment1: Windows down radio blaring. Your hair down in your eyes and. You dance like no ones watching at all. Like a child
english.segment2: Head back laughing, crying. The pedal down as we keep driving. You never ask are we there yet. Like a child
english.segment3: And we drive. We drive on into the night. Yea we drive. Dont think twice not to say goodbye
english.segment4: Your hands out, playing with the wind. As its kissin all your fingertips. And you smell the rain. As it starts pouring in (like we care)
english.segment5: The clock reads 2 am. Its been so far. But we just started this. No telling where, why, or how far its been (like we care)
english.segment6: We just drive. We drive on into the night. Yea we drive. Dont think twice not to say goodbye
english.segment7: Yea we drive. We drive on into the night. Yea we drive. To find the morning light
english.segment8: Come with me. Leave your hate, your fears. Don't look back. Leave the past behind
english.segment9: Come with me. Bring your heart, your dreams. Don't look back. We don't need to hide
english.segment11: In the morning light. Sit back, enjoy the ride
english.segment12: In the morning light. Look up, hold on tight (hold on tight)
english.segment13: Come with me. Leave your hate, your fears. Don't look back. Leave the past behind you
english.segment14: Come with me. Bring your heart, your dreams. Don't look back. We don't need to hide
english.segment15: Come with me. Leave your hate, your fears. Don't look back. Leave the past behind
english.segment16: Come with me. Bring your heart, your dreams. Don't look back. We don't need to hide
